metadata.title: CVE-2021-3700 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability was found in usbredir in versions prior to 0.11.0 in the usbredirparser_serialize() in usbredirparser/usbredirparser.c. This issue occurs when serializing large amounts of buffered write data in the case of a slow or blocked destination.

criterions.comment: usbredir package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
